trans-unit.source: Represents an X.509 store, which is a physical store where certificates are persisted and managed.
This class cannot be inherited.
Use this class to work with an X.509 store.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別來搭配 X.509 存放區。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> class does not implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method.
trans-unit.target: 以目標應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及更新版本、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>類別未實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two examples.
trans-unit.target: 本章節包含兩個範例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何開啟標準 X.509 存放區和清單的憑證數目在每個。

trans-unit.source: The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例示範如何加入和移除單一憑證和憑證的範圍。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會嘗試開啟目前電腦上每個標準位置中的每個標準的存放區。

trans-unit.source: It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它會列印顯示是否每個存放區存在，而且，如果數目，憑證就會包含摘要。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object for each combination of standard name and standard location.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>標準名稱和標準位置的每個組合的物件。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A> method with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，這會開啟實體存放區，只有當它已經存在。

trans-unit.source: If the physical store exists, the example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A> properties to display the number of certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果實體存放區存在，此範例會使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A>屬性存放區中顯示的憑證數目。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 本範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，並再關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the personal certificates of the current user store.
Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object using the personal X.509 certificate store for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>物件目前的使用者使用個人的 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: A handle to an <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> store.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using an Intptr handle to an <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> store.
Use this constructor to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式，以提供與 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 相容性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`HCERTSTORE`處理，請參閱 Platform SDK 章節中的 unmanaged 的 CAPI 文件[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="storeHandle" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="storeHandle" /> parameter points to an invalid context.
for unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 對於 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the location of the X.509 certificate store.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> value.

Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object, specifying the store location, which is either the location for the current user or the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>物件，指定存放區位置，也就是目前使用者的位置或在本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> value.
Use this constructor to create an X.509 store for the current user that corresponds to values enumerated by <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立 X.509 存放區列舉的值相對應之目前使用者使用這個建構函式<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the store name.
See <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> for more information.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the specified store name.
Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object using a particular X.509 store name for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>物件使用目前使用者的特定 X.509 存放區名稱。

trans-unit.source: To create a new store, specify a name that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立新的存放區，請指定不存在的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A new store will be created with that name.
trans-unit.target: 具有該名稱，將會建立新的存放區。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the location of the X.509 certificate store.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> and <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> values.
Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object, specifying both the store name and the store location.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>物件，指定商店名稱與存放區位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="storeLocation" /> is not a valid location or <paramref name="storeName" /> is not a valid name.
for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a value from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> enumeration.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the location of the X.509 certificate store.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> class using a string that represents a value from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName" /> enumeration and a value from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation" /> enumeration.
Use this constructor to create an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object using a store name and location.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>物件使用的存放區名稱和位置。

trans-unit.source: To create a new store, specify a name that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立新的存放區，請指定不存在的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A new store will be created with that name.
trans-unit.target: 具有該名稱，將會建立新的存放區。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="storeLocation" /> contains invalid values.
for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: The certificate to add.
Adds a certificate to an X.509 certificate store.
Use this method to add a single certificate to an X.509 store.
trans-unit.target: 單一憑證加入 X.509 存放區中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The certificate could not be added to the store.
for adding certificates to an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 憑證加入 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.AddToStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.AddToStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: The collection of certificates to add.
Adds a collection of certificates to an X.509 certificate store.
This method adds more than one certificate to an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate addition fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are added.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將一個以上的憑證加入 X.509 憑證存放區。如果某個憑證加入失敗，則會還原作業，並不加入任何憑證。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The caller does not have the required permission.
for adding certificates to an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 憑證加入 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.AddToStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.AddToStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of certificates located in an X.509 certificate store.
A collection of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a snapshot of the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回的 X.509 憑證存放區的快照集。

trans-unit.source: Note that subsequent <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Remove%2A> operations performed on the store will not have any effect on the collection that is returned.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，後續<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Remove%2A>的存放區上執行的作業不會影響傳回的集合。

trans-unit.source: This snapshot is recalculated each time the property is called, so the use of this property inside an iterative function is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 這個快照被每當呼叫該屬性時，因此不建議使用這個重複函式內的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two examples.
trans-unit.target: 本章節包含兩個範例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何開啟標準 X.509 存放區和清單的憑證數目在每個。

trans-unit.source: The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例示範如何加入和移除單一憑證和憑證的範圍。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會嘗試開啟目前電腦上每個標準位置中的每個標準的存放區。

trans-unit.source: It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它會列印顯示是否每個存放區存在，而且，如果數目，憑證就會包含摘要。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object for each combination of standard name and standard location.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>標準名稱和標準位置的每個組合的物件。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A> method with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，這會開啟實體存放區，只有當它已經存在。

trans-unit.source: If the physical store exists, the example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A> properties to display the number of certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果實體存放區存在，此範例會使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A>屬性存放區中顯示的憑證數目。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 本範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，並再關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: for enumerating certificates in an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 列舉中的 X.509 憑證的憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Closes an X.509 certificate store.
This method releases all resources associated with the store.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會釋放與存放區相關聯的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: You should always close an X.509 certificate store after use.
trans-unit.target: 您一律應在使用後關閉 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" />.

<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> class does not implement this interface, and therefore the `Dispose` method does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> 實作<xref:System.IDisposable>開頭的介面[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>類別未實作這個介面，因此`Dispose`方法不存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the X.509 certificate store.
The location of the certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 憑證存放區的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the X.509 certificate store location of either the store for the current user or the store for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回目前使用者存放區或本機電腦存放區中的其中一個的 X.509 憑證存放區位置。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two examples.
trans-unit.target: 本章節包含兩個範例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何開啟標準 X.509 存放區和清單的憑證數目在每個。

trans-unit.source: The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例示範如何加入和移除單一憑證和憑證的範圍。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會嘗試開啟目前電腦上每個標準位置中的每個標準的存放區。

trans-unit.source: It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它會列印顯示是否每個存放區存在，而且，如果數目，憑證就會包含摘要。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object for each combination of standard name and standard location.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>標準名稱和標準位置的每個組合的物件。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A> method with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，這會開啟實體存放區，只有當它已經存在。

trans-unit.source: If the physical store exists, the example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A> properties to display the number of certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果實體存放區存在，此範例會使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A>屬性存放區中顯示的憑證數目。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 本範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，並再關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the X.509 certificate store.
The name of the certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 憑證存放區的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the X.509 certificate store name.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性傳回的 X.509 憑證存放區名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value can indicate the type of certificates stored, such as root certificates or certificates from trusted publishers.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以表示憑證儲存，例如根憑證或憑證來自受信任的發行者的類型。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two examples.
trans-unit.target: 本章節包含兩個範例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何開啟標準 X.509 存放區和清單的憑證數目在每個。

trans-unit.source: The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例示範如何加入和移除單一憑證和憑證的範圍。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會嘗試開啟目前電腦上每個標準位置中的每個標準的存放區。

trans-unit.source: It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它會列印顯示是否每個存放區存在，而且，如果數目，憑證就會包含摘要。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store> object for each combination of standard name and standard location.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store>標準名稱和標準位置的每個組合的物件。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A> method with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Open%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標，這會開啟實體存放區，只有當它已經存在。

trans-unit.source: If the physical store exists, the example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A> properties to display the number of certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 如果實體存放區存在，此範例會使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Location%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.Certificates%2A>屬性存放區中顯示的憑證數目。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 本範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，並再關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that specifies the way to open the X.509 certificate store.
Opens an X.509 certificate store or creates a new store, depending on <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags" /> flag settings.
Use this method to open an existing X.509 store.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟現有的 X.509 存放區中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must have additional permissions, specified by <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags>, to enumerate the certificates in the store.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須具有所指定的其他權限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags>，列舉存放區中的憑證。

trans-unit.source: You can create a new store by passing a store name that does not exist to the class constructor, and then using any of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags> flags except <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立新的存放區的類別建構函式，傳遞不存在存放區名稱，然後使用任一<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags>加上旗標以外<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags.OpenExistingOnly>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: The store is unreadable.
The caller does not have the required permission.
The store contains invalid values.
for opening an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 X.509 憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.CreateStore" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.OpenStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.CreateStore" />

trans-unit.source: The certificate to remove.
Removes a certificate from an X.509 certificate store.
Use this method to remove a single certificate from an X.509 store.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來移除 X.509 存放區中的單一憑證。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The caller does not have the required permission.
for removing certificates from an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 移除 X.509 憑證的憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.RemoveFromStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.RemoveFromStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: A range of certificates to remove.
Removes a range of certificates from an X.509 certificate store.
This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: This method removes more than one certificate from an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate removal fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are removed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 X.509 憑證存放區; 移除一個以上的憑證如果某個憑證移除失敗，則會還原作業，並不移除任何憑證。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，然後關閉存放區。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: 它會假設您有三個憑證以加入和移除從本機存放區。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The caller does not have the required permission.
for removing certificates from an X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 移除 X.509 憑證的憑證存放區。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.RemoveFromStore" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.RemoveFromStore" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> handle to an <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> store.
A handle to an <see langword="HCERTSTORE" /> store.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼<see langword="HCERTSTORE" />儲存。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.StoreHandle%2A> property to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store.StoreHandle%2A>屬性以提供與 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 相容性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`HCERTSTORE`處理，請參閱 Platform SDK 章節中的 unmanaged 的 CAPI 文件[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。

trans-unit.source: The store is not open.
for unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 對於 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
